deviceKnown.info.connectToComputer: 确保您的 {deviceName} 连接到您的计算机
deviceKnown.info.doNotDisconnect: 在所有操作完成前不要断开
deviceKnown.info.pressContinue: 准备好时点击下面的继续按键
deviceKnown.choseWrongDevice: 选择了错误的设备型号?
operation.top.ledgerDeviceInfo: 在您的Ledger上执行以下操作
hint.common.pinCode: 如果您的Ledger设备锁屏了，输入您的PIN，通过 右键 和 左键 来选择相应数字，并 同时按 两个 键确认。
hint.common.CardanoApp: Highlight the Cardano ADA app on your Ledger and press both buttons.
hint.connect.exportPublicKey: Check your Ledger screen, then press both buttons.
hint.connect.confirmExportPublicKey: Confirm exporting the public key by pressing right button.
hint.nanoX.connect.confirmExportPublicKe: Confirm exporting the public key by pressing both buttons.
hint.sendTx.startNewTx: Check your Ledger screen, then press right button.
hint.nanoX.sendTx.startNewTx: Check your Ledger screen, then press both buttons.
hint.sendTx.confirmValue: Confirm the ADA amount by pressing both buttons.
hint.sendTx.confirmAddress: Confirm the receiver's address by pressing both buttons.
hint.nanoX.sendTx.confirmAddress: Confirm the receiver's address by pressing the right button to scroll through the entire address. Then press both buttons.
hint.sendTx.confirmFee: Confirm Transaction Fee by pressing both buttons.
hint.sendTx.confirmTx: Confirm the transaction by pressing the right button.
hint.nanoX.sendTx.confirmTx: Confirm the transaction by pressing the both buttons.
hint.verifyAddress.info: Check your Ledger screen, then press both buttons.
hint.verifyAddress.path: Make sure the address path shown on your Ledger is the same as the one shown below, then press both buttons.
hint.verifyAddress.address: Make sure the address shown on your Ledger is the same as the one shown below, then press both buttons.
hint.nanoX.verifyAddress.address: Make sure the address shown on your Ledger is the same as the one shown below. Press the right button on your Ledger to scroll to the end of the address, then press both buttons.
